title: I accidentally washed my Pixel 2 in the washing machine. It still works is it safe to use? Not brok
content: I accidentally wash my pixel 2 in the washing machine full cycle.  I got it out and it was amazing it is not broke and it came on.  I powered it down, and I need to know if I am the most luckiest person there is in this community and is it safe to use, or should I wait some hours to be sure?
